# rexpect

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/rexpect)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rexpect)
<!-- badges: end -->

`rexpect` provides a pipeable interface that allows you to automate interactions with programs that expose a text terminal interface. The API is based on the original Expect tool by Don Libes.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("datascienceworkshops/rexpect")
```
